CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Company has been reviewed against KKR's Gating Issues list to determine whether there are any critical ESG or reputational concerns with regards to target companies, operators, issuers, and, where relevant, sponsor. Where relevant, identified issues have been discussed with KKR Public Affairs (kkresg@kkr.com).
CustomField.label: ESG Gating Issues List Reviewed?
